Products and Services
Racquets and Demos
Racquets and Demos
For Sale:
Demos:
All for sale are available to demo.

There is a $, one-time fee to demo, during a time period. Demo up to three Racquets / Paddles at a time, for three days at a time. It might take more than one demo session to determine which racquet suits your needs. The demo fee is then credited towards the purchase of any new adult frame.

Bring your current racquet with you to begin the demo process, as it gives us a great starting point of what you you might want to demo. As MRT and CS certified stringers, we are able to assist you in determining the racquet best suited to your game.
Stringing
Stringing
Bring your own string or choose from our many options from . We string . Due to high volume of racquet stringing, same day stringing isn’t always available – usual stringing turn-around is .

The installation of strings costs $. If you choose to purchase them from us, strings cost an additional .

Master Racquet Technicians (MRT), and Certified Stringers (CS), with the United States Racquet Stringer’s Association (USRSA) are on staff. Philip van Asselt, has been a member of the USRSA since 1998 and is also a member of the International Alliance of Racquet Stringers (IART) dedicated to improving and promoting stringing and serving the needs of the tennis playing community.
